articles.title: Water gushes down slope in Bukit Batok, passers-by help clean up debris on road - AsiaOne
articles.description: Muddy water from a drain on a slope near Block 383 Goodview Gardens gushed onto Bukit Batok West Avenue 5, surprising motorists and passers-by on Thursday evening (July 15). The incident was caught on video and uploaded on the same day by Reddit user Deminovi…
articles.content:
Muddy water from a drain on a slope near Block 383 Goodview Gardens gushed onto Bukit Batok West Avenue 5, surprising motorists and passers-by on Thursday evening (July 15).

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Philippines confirms first Delta variant death amid vaccine drive - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Discovery of more transmissible COVID-19 variant comes amid strain’s rapid spread elsewhere in Southeast Asia.
articles.content: The Philippines has confirmed its first death and locally transmitted cases of the more infectious Delta coronavirus variant, the health ministry said on Friday, as the country attempts to ramp up it… [+4497 chars]

articles.title: Passengers share what it was like on cruise ship after passenger linked to KTV Covid-19 cluster tested positive - AsiaOne
articles.description: With no idea what time they'll be disembarking, over 1,600 passengers aboard Dream World were stuck in their cabins for the entire day on Wednesday (July 14). They endured a 20-hour wait on the cruise ship docked at Marina Bay Cruise Centre after the Ministry…
